title: Sheffer sequence
summary: In mathematics, a Sheffer sequence or poweroid is a polynomial sequence, i.e., a sequence (pn(x)Â : n = 0, 1, 2, 3, ...) of polynomials in which the index of each polynomial equals its degree, satisfying conditions related to the umbral calculus in combinatorics.
